content:

Any advice? Thanks in advance.

title: My bookmarks did not sync upon reinstall
content:
So I had to reset my entire computer (deleting everything, keys, files, all that) and since I was logged in with my Firefox account in my browser, I assumed all my bookmarks would be synced to the account and I thus forgot to make a file of them before the reset. But when I reinstalled Firefox and logged in, none of the bookmarks were there. For a few days I could still see them on my phone so I clicked sync there in the hopes, they would then show up on my desktop but instead they are now all gone on my phone, too (which is obviously the opposite effect of what I wanted).

However, I can still see the synced tabs of the previous version of my desktop Firefox, which gives me a glimmer of hope that my bookmarks from that version aren't completely gone yet. But I have no idea if there is any way to access them, which really frustrates me. Is there a solution for this? Those bookmarks were very important to me.

title: Don't know how to permanently change AO3's default font to one my Screen-reader can see formatting with in Firefox
content:
So my last thread on this was archived without anyone giving me a reason or answering my question.

I have had issues with the website Archive of Our Own since last November, when I tried to change the site skin and permanently changed the default font of that site to something called Lucida Sans Unicode, when it's apparently meant to be Lucida Grande.

This much I was able to work out via my previous thread, but when I asked for that last bit of help, nobody answered and my thread was instead archived.

I don't know how to change a font on a specific website. I don't even know if the site has tools I could use that would work for me. All I know is I still cannot read bold or italics on Archive of Our Own with my screen-reader, NVDA, unless I use reader view, which excludes author's notes and comments, and I had thought I was close to a breakthrough before my thread was unceremoniously archived.

For reference, the thread is here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1403415

I tried inserting a link via the button above this box but it did not give me the necessary code used in this forum for links, so a straight url is the best I can do.

title: Facebook showing popups without any tabs open
content:
Hi,

I do not have any plugins that would affect this in any way which leads me to believe that Firefox is keeping me connected to facebook when I don't want it to.

If this is the case I'd love to know where the settings for this are, because any search results I do lead me to plugins, which I don't believe this to be an issue with, and maybe also recommend not to have them on by default. When I have my browser open I like to know that what I see is what I get, and having facebook open in the background without my knowledge, I do not appreciate.

title: Metamask support redirect me to you at Firefox
content:
Hi Firefox Support,

I was directed to contact you by Metamask Support. I'm experiencing a problem connecting to Metamask from Firefox, though it connects without any issues in Chrome. Based on this, Metamask Support believes the issue may be related to Firefox.

Here's what I've done to troubleshoot so far:

Cleared cache data in Firefox. Verified that I'm using the latest version of Metamask (34.0). Encountered an error when trying to switch networks with the message "unable to connect to Polygon." Confirmed that no other wallets are causing conflicts. I've attached some screenshots for your reference.

Given that I can connect to Metamask in Chrome and have already cleared data in Firefox and ensured I'm using the latest version of Metamask, Metamask Support suggested the problem might lie with Firefox.

Could you please help?

Thank you.

title: Tôi không thể truy cập vào gmail để kiểm tra khi dùng Mozilla Firefox
content:
Tôi không thể truy cập vào Gmail để kiểm tra khi dùng Mozilla Firefox? Khi truy cập vào Gmail thì chỉ hiện trang có thông báo như sau: "Không kết nối: Sự cố bảo mật tiềm ẩn

Firefox phát hiện một mối đe dọa bảo mật tiềm năng và không tiếp tục đến mail.google.com vì trang web này yêu cầu kết nối an toàn.

Bạn có thể làm gì về nó?

mail.google.com có chính sách bảo mật được gọi là HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS), có nghĩa là Firefox chỉ có thể kết nối với nó một cách an toàn. Bạn không thể thêm ngoại lệ để truy cập trang web này.

Vấn đề rất có thể xảy ra với trang web và bạn không thể làm gì để giải quyết nó.

Nếu bạn đang sử dụng mạng công ty hoặc sử dụng phần mềm chống vi-rút, bạn có thể liên hệ với nhóm hỗ trợ để được trợ giúp. Bạn cũng có thể thông báo cho quản trị viên của trang web về sự cố.

Tìm hiểu thêm…" Tôi không biết phải làm sao để vào Gmail để nhận và trả lời email trên Mozilla Firfox. Mong mọi người hướng dẫn để tôi có thể sử dụng Mozilla Firefox truy cập Gmail. Xin trân thành cảm ơn!

Selecting the `delete cookies when I close tabs` works, but each time I load Firefox I have to log back into a lot of things. So - to me - that isn't doing what I want.

Thanks in advance.
